how.title: Points Evaluation and Tracking System
how.subtitle: For the student club represented by Google Developer Student Clubs
how.departmentActivities: Activity Types and Basic Points (for Department)
how.footer: Enhancing students' skills in technology and programming through interactive activities and events
how.generalIdea1: Each activity has basic points + multipliers (based on attendance, quality, time commitment, etc.).
how.generalIdea2: There are points for departments (department points) and points for members (member points).
how.generalIdea3: The reports department is responsible for verification, recording, calculation, and publishing results boards periodically.
